txt.en: You have slain the Butcher of Lumrog and broken his control over the beasts he commanded. Theirs was a loyalty borne of fear; now free of it, it is your hope they will find it difficult to mount successful raids upon travellers in Misthallow.
Deep within Lumrog, a fearsome hill-troll keeps the other creatures there in line. This beast is Torask-rúm, the Butcher of Lumrog, and if he is defeated the resolve of his underlings may waver.
Torask-rúm, the Butcher of Lumrog, is no more
Torask-rúm, the Butcher of Lumrog, is a fearsome hill-troll keeps the other creatures within Lumrog in line. Defeating this creature should break the resolve of his underlings.

A fearsome hill-troll, Torask-rúm, has long made Lumrog its home. Known as the Butcher of Lumrog, this creature has kept its minions in check. Defeating this creature should break the resolve of the underlings.
Defeat Torask-rúm, the Butcher of Lumrog
Deep within Lumrog, a fearsome hill-troll keeps the other creatures there in line. This beast is Torask-rúm, the Butcher of Lumrog, and if he is defeated the resolve of his underlings may waver.
